channel.title: [667] Null on Death
channel.description:
So, after a random amount of kills (could be 40 could be 2 etc) my server nulls when a player dies, and I get this error
Revision : 667

item.title: [667] Null on Death
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

[quote=“hadesflames, post:10, topic:534180”]Go to ./com/rs/game/Entity.java and replace it with this:

http://pastebin.com/7J4Amamc

No guarantees it’ll actually fix, as I can’t be bothered actually running tests atm.

If you’ve changed anything to Entity.java after dling your source, you should post it for me to apply the change I made to it so you don’t lose whatever you’ve done.[/quote]

Trying this method, thank’s for the reply I appreciate it, will post results.

Edit* Same result

Read full topic

No guarantees it’ll actually fix, as I can’t be bothered actually running tests atm.

If you’ve changed anything to Entity.java after dling your source, you should post it for me to apply the change I made to it so you don’t lose whatever you’ve done.
